attributes.action: Give more help from the NHS to people suffering from Agoraphobia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1 In 5 people in the UK suffer or have suffered with Agoraphobia. Not enough awareness is being made to the public and especially not enough support. Teenagers out of secondary school are becoming more affected leading to depression and other health issues. The NHS need to help people more with the condition.
